media:group.media:title: [Speedrun Guide] Demon Slayer
media:group.media:description:
0:00 settings Open the castle doors settings: enable shift drop and attack options are right click on NPC Quick hop to another world 2 to disable the warning message
1:09 Talk to Aris 1, 2, 3 cutscene: write down incantation sequence order 1 carlem 2 aber 3 camerinthum 4 purchai 5 gabindo
press space thrice to start speenrun
2:20 Talk to Sir Prysin _ 3 __ 1 __ __ 2 __ ___ 1 ___ __ 2:54 Talk to Captain rovin _ 3 __ 1 __ 2 __ 2 __ __3 ___ 1 ___ ___ 3:28 Flush the drain 3:52 fetch the rusty key 4:26 Soul wars 4:48 Pick up bones and hop worlds 6:35 Draynor bank 7:40 Diago 7:52 Traiborn 8:42 Silverlight 9:42 Delrith 10:23 rant 11:17 one shot

media:group.media:title: [Speedrun Guide] Ernest the Chicken
media:group.media:description:
0. Open every door in the manor 1. Talk to Veronica _ 1 __ __ 2. Grab the fish food and drop tuna 3. Go to the basement. Pull levers in this order. BA, D, BA, FE, C, E 4. Pick up the poison and spade 5. Use spade on the compost heap 6. Drop spade and use poisoned fish food on the fountain. Search the fountain __ 7. Grab the rubber tube 8. Talk to Prof. Oddenstein _ 1 __ __ ___ 2 __ __ 9. Talk to Prof. Oddenstein again ___ 9.1 Once transformed, click on the ground to exit the conversation and finish the speedrun
Which came first? Chicken or the Ernest? Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slayermusiq1 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slayermusiq1 Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest

0. Open Morgan's door and cupboard 1. Talk to Morgan ___ 1 ___ 1.1 Grab garlic. 2 Buy chronicle and 1 teleport card 3. Teleport and enter blue moon inn 4. Talk to the bartender _ 1 __ 4.1 Talk to Harlow _ 2 ___ ___ 4.2 Talk to Harlow again ___ ___ ___ 5. Home tele 5.1 Claim training bow and arrows 5.2 Buy hammer from general store 6. Run to and defeat count Draynor 6.1 Hawk eye prayer and bow set on rapid
Is Vampire spelled with a y or a i? Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slayermusiq1 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slayermusiq1 Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest

media:group.media:title: [Speedrun Guide] Cook's assistant
media:group.media:description:
Got milk? 0. Opening the door of the mill and Fred's gate, wheat gate, dairy cow gate 1. Start and pick up the pot 2. Talk to Fayeth 3 __ 2 __ 1 _ 3. Pick up Fred's egg 4. Pick wheat 5. Use the hopper and hopper controls 6. Fill the pot with flour 7. Milk the dairy cow 8. Home tele and finish

media:group.media:title: [Quest Guide] Sleeping giants
media:group.media:description:
items needed: - 3 oak logs - 10 metal nails - Hammer - Chisel - Wool (regular so not spun into a ball)
recommended: - (Bucket of water or ice gloves) - 21 empty invent slots ignoring the required items
Teleports: - 1 quest completion Quests: / skills: 15 Smithing
0:00 intro 1:00 repairing machinery 3:00 creating a flat broad sword
0) run from Al Kharid east following the path up the giants plateau SW of it is the quest start
1) Strike the Giant to talk to Kovac 1 Triggers a 1 minute cutscene Put your phone on the keyboard to press space We are first going to fix all the machinery in the foundry and then do the smithing minigame once
2) SW fix the polishing wheel 1
3) W fix grindstone 1
4) NW fix triphammer 1
5) Talk to Kovac to make your first giant’s sword fade to black
6) Talk to Kovac again you make a flat broad sword
7) Drop your hammer and chisel if you do not have 21 inventory slots search the crate next to Kovac for some metals search the pile of buckets west if you have not brought a bucket of water or ice gloves fill your bucket with water
8) Behind Kovac is a big metal bucket click on it twice and deposit all the bronze and iron bars next use the weapons and platebodies on it and deposit them too
9) Talk to Kovac set up the mould next to him first tab is the forte select the flattest and broadest second tab is the blade 3rd is the tap bottom left you can check your flatness and broadness set the mould
10) Talk to Kovac and he’ll check it out pour the crucible into the mould pour bucket of water over the mould pick up the sword
11) Go NW and wait until your top red bar has a white outline Use the Trip hammer until it almost reaches yellow This should be around 8 hits with the hammer Go NE and rightclick on the lava DUNK preform until red bar is almost at the end as it must still have a white outline Use trip hammer again until your bottom bar reaches yellow
12) Go to the waterfall and quench the preform until the sword’s temperature is almost yellow use the grindstone and waterfall until the sword is almost complete
13) Quench the presform until it is high green SW use the polishing wheel Dunk it in the lava one last time until the temperature is high green again polish it one last time to complete your quest
14) Talk to Kovac the sword commission is for his friend Obor
1 QP 6k smithing Access to use the giant's foundry whenever you like
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slayermusiq1 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slayermusiq1 Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest

media:group.media:title: [HcUim 22] Back after a 3 year hiatus
media:group.media:description:
Regular UIM with 2 additional rules: - No looting bag - No death storage
So if I happen to die to e.g. Vorkath, I'll have to discard everything that is in the death storage. Good thing this account is basically a skiller tho.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slayermusiq1 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slayermusiq1 Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest

media:group.media:title: [Quest Guide] Beneath cursed sands
media:group.media:description:
items needed: - Coal - Iron bar - Any raw or cooked meat or 5gp
recommended: - 2-3 stamina pots - armor, weapon I suggest ranged until the final boss --- 174 w/out protection prayer w/ max hit of 16 at start of quest --- 2x cb 119 mage --- 379 mage weak to ranged, switch to rapid ranged wep switch to kill swarms of 5-20hp --- 351 weak to melee - antidote (4) - 4 waterskins or desert amulet 4 - good food and potions - 4 empty invent slot
Teleports: - (1) 2 Nardah - Pharaoh's sceptre or 400 gp/200/0 gp depending if youve completed the rogue trader or desert 3
Quests: Contact! Skills: 55 Crafting and Firemaking, 62 Agility
0:00 intro 1:54 Getting into Necropolis 3:40 Demi boss 1 5:00 ruins of Ullek 9:00 beneath the ruins of Ullek 11:59 Urn puzzle 14:22 Champion of Scabaras 18:53 Pox cure 26:02 Menaphite Akh

media:group.media:title: [Quick Guide] King's ransom
media:group.media:description:
items needed: - 1 block of granite of any size - Regular black full helm, platebody and platelegs/skirt - bronze med helm and iron chainbody
recommended: - Be on Regular spellbook or have spellbook swap ready - 1 law and air rune - Weight reducing clothing - Check your bank for an Animate Rock Scroll. If you don’t own it anymore, you’ll get one during the quest. - 4 empty invent slots
Teleports: - 3 Camelot - 1 East Ardy - 1 Black knight’s fortress [Lassar teleport / cb brace monastery / edgeville / falador] - 1 quest completion
Quests: Holy Grail, One small Favour, Murder mystery and Black knight’s fortress skills: 45 Magic and 65 Defence
0:00 intro 1:41 The mansion 4:14 Courthouse 7:40 Keep le Fay 10:16 Freeing Arthur
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slayermusiq1 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slayermusiq1 Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest

media:group.media:title: [Quest Guide] Temple of the eye
media:group.media:description:
items needed: bucket of water
recommended: 10 empty inventory slots and weight reducing clothing
Teleports: - 1 SE Varrock [chronicle] - 1 North of Al Kharid - 1 after quest completion
0:00 Intro 0:55 Start 3:21 Abyss 5:29 Wizard's tower 8:46 Temple of the eye 10:42 Minigame tutorial
1) Talk to Persten 2 1 2) Teleport to the mage of Zamorak in SE Varrock 1 3 3) Talk to the tea seller just north 3, tea cannot be obtained before talking to the mage 4) Use the tea on the Mage of Zamorak 1 5) Use the amulet on the dark mage
We must now make every runic energy turn white by touching it, but the order they must touched in, is random for everyone. Let’s brute force our way through this puzzle. Touch every energy until one lights up touch another one if both did not turn white; touch the first one again and try another one do this until all 6 are touched in the correct order.
6) Talk to the Dark mage 7) Teleport to the quest start point and talk to Persten 1 drop bucket 8) Talk to Sedridor in the basement 2 4 9) Go up to the middle floor and talk to Traiborn 2 10) Talk to every apprentice in this room to view there riddle parts (this cannot be skipped) 11) Talk to Traiborn 2 11 11) Talk to Sedridor in the basement 1 cutscene
12) Talk to Felix next to you 13) Talk to Tamara west 14) Talk to Cordelia 15) Talk to Persten in the centre cutscene (talking to apprentices cannot be skipped)
16) Just south, pick up the pickaxe and chisel 17) Follow the arrows to complete the tutorial of this minigame Once you are done after 5 minutes of following pointing arrows,1 QP 5k RC +1800 Access to the temple of the eye a medium pouch
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slayermusiq1 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slayermusiq1 Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest

media:group.media:title: [Mini-quest Guide] Hopespear's will
media:group.media:description:
items needed: -amulet of ghostspeak - ring of visability - 1+ dose of goblin potion
recommended: - nothing equipped
During battle: - Nothing is allowed to be equipped but amulet of ghostspeak and ring of visibility. Mory legs must be unequipped - thralls probably not - use of potions and food and prayers are OK - Restore potion if going to defeat all in one go. Else to tp placues such as the Xerox enclave to restore your stats and prep for the next battles
Teleports: - 1 to fairy ring code BLQ bring a dramen staff is you have yet to complete the lumb elite - 1 out of yu’biusk
Quests: land of the goblins, DT, FTp2 skills: 50 prayer 0) Make a goblin potion
1) Talk to hopespear 2 1 1 1 1 1 1
Defeat SW cb 32 only melee SE cb 56 melee and ranged NW cb 88 melee, ranged, magic NE cb 121 melee, magic, stat drain N cb 184 melee, ranged, magic, stat drain, thralls
2) teleport to BLQ bury all 5 bones for mini quest completion and 38,750 prayer xp
0:00 Intro 1:46 Start 3:21 Snothead 4:01 Snailfeet 5:02 Mosschin 6:06 Redeyes 7:34 Strongbones 9:31 Finishing up
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slayermusiq1 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/slayermusiq1 Old School Runescape 2007 2007scape quest
